comments: I loved taking this class! As long as you do your work you will pass. Ms. Hughes is great to work with and is very understanding.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I had Mrs Hughes for two semesters for two different english classes, she is AWESOME. She was also my advisor. As long as you go to class and do the essays she assigns you are golden. She explains how and what she wants and expects and the rest is up to you. She responds quickly to email and phone calls.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: Eng 101 class is extremely easy. We only met once a week and she never kept us the whole class period. She is always in her office willing to help.

tag_professor: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  Clear grading criteria (1)  Gives good feedback (1)
comments: I took her class over the summer. It was sooo easy. It was a once a week, four class and we never stayed longer than an hour. She is very leniant and very helpful. Class is a very easy "A". I would definately recommend her! She is very nice too.
